title: A playn and fynall confutacion: Of cammells corlyke oblatracion
author: Churchyard, Thomas, 1520?-1604.
publisher: Imprinted in Fletstrit by Wyllyam Gryffyth, a lyttle aboue the condit at the syne of the Gryffyn,
